item.title: 卡尼承诺取消碳税后，加拿大碳税似乎已夭折
item.description: 在接替总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）担任自由党领袖的两位主要竞争者都承诺取消加拿大对消费者燃料征收的全国碳税之后，加拿大的全国碳税很可能已进入最后几周。【原文：Canada’s national carbon tax on consumer fuels is likely in its final weeks after both major contenders to replace Prime Minister Justin Trudeau as Liberal leader have promised to scrap it.】

item.title: 结称赞欧洲央行在不影响就业的情况下抑制物价方面取得进展
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，欧洲中央银行成功地将通胀率从历史高位降了下来，同时又没有对欧元经济和人民造成严重损害。【原文：The European Central Bank has managed to bring down inflation from record highs without seriously damaging the euro economy and its people, according to Governing Council member Klaas Knot.】

item.title: 乔希-扬格和列夫-梅南德：为什么稳定币不是新的欧洲美元？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 贝莱德曾经强大的通胀对冲 ETF 正在失去王冠
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：A once-dominant BlackRock Inc. bond ETF is at risk of losing its crown as the biggest inflation-hedging product of its kind, after schooling investors about the dangers of safety trades laden with interest-rate risk.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命塔库尔为唯一全球市场主管，西佩尔离职
item.description: 摩根大通全球市场联席主管 Jason Sippel 在建立公司股票业务方面发挥了重要作用，他即将离职，Pranav Thakur 将被任命为华尔街最大交易柜台的唯一主管。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Jason Sippel, co-head of global markets who was instrumental in building out the firm’s equities business, is leaving, with Pranav Thakur named sole head of Wall Street’s biggest trading desk.】

item.title: 塞尔萨钢铁公司启动向西班牙投资者出售 20% 股份的程序
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，作为 2023 年批准的重组计划的一部分，钢铁制造商 Celsa 集团已启动了向一家西班牙投资者出售多达 20% 股份的程序。【原文：Steelmaker Celsa Group has kicked off a process to sell a stake of as much as 20% to a Spanish investor as part of a restructuring plan approved in 2023, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋周五将在白宫会见特朗普
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将于周五在白宫会见英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang），几天前，DeepSeek公司的一个新的中国人工智能模型引发了科技行业领袖的担忧，并导致美国股市下跌。【原文：President Donald Trump will meet with Nvidia Corp. chief executive Jensen Huang at the White House on Friday, according to people familiar, days after a new Chinese AI model from DeepSeek sparked concern among technology industry leaders and tanked the US stock market.】

item.title: 津巴布韦计划采取新措施整顿非正规经济部门
item.description: 津巴布韦财政部长姆图利-恩库比（Mthuli Ncube）表示，非正规部门正在威胁正规企业的生存，津巴布韦计划采取新的措施来遏制非正规部门的发展。【原文：Zimbabwe plans to introduce new measures to rein in a burgeoning informal sector that’s threatening the survival of formal businesses, Finance Minister Mthuli Ncube said.】

item.title: 野村向迪拜豪华建筑商发放 1 亿美元私人贷款
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. is providing a $100 million loan to a development project run by Dubai-based Omniyat, people familiar with the matter said, joining other global lenders that are increasingly looking for dealmaking opportunities in the Middle East.】

item.title: 乌干达最高法院裁定对平民的军事审判非法
item.description: 乌干达最高法院裁定，在军事法庭起诉平民违反宪法，这有可能为因涉嫌叛国而被军事法庭审判的反对派领导人基扎-贝西杰（Kizza Besigye）提供宽慰。【原文：Uganda’s Supreme Court ruled that prosecuting civilians in military court was unconstitutional, potentially offering relief for opposition leader Kizza Besigye, who’s under court martial for alleged treason.】

item.title: Old Mutual 首席执行官认为中美之争给非洲带来了一线希望
item.description: 如果美国和中国这两个世界头号经济大国开始不得不从其他地方进口，那么中美之间的贸易战可能会给非洲的出口商带来一线希望。【原文：A trade war between the US and China could prove a silver lining for Africa’s exporters if the world’s two top economic powers start having to import from elsewhere.】

item.title: 人工智能部长表示，使用 DeepSeek 的英国人应警惕风险
item.description: 英国人工智能大臣费雷尔-克拉克（Feryal Clark）表示，使用中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 聊天机器人的英国人应警惕其个人数据面临的风险。【原文：Britons using a chatbot from Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek should be alert to the risk to their personal data, the UK’s AI minister Feryal Clark said.】

item.title: 被动投资时代，"神奇 "高效市场理论遭抨击
item.description: 乍一看，本周的股票交易很难说是市场效率理论的典范，而市场效率理论是《经济学 101》中经常被浪漫化的理念。毕竟，受一周前发布的人工智能模型的担忧刺激，大型股票指数在周一暴跌，随后迅速反弹。【原文：At first blush, stock trading this week is hardly a paragon of the market-efficiency theory, an oft-romanticized idea in Economics 101. After all, big equity gauges plunged on Monday, spurred by fears of an AI model released a week earlier, before swiftly rebounding.】

item.title: 贸易商在飞往美国的飞机上装载黄金和白银，押注关税
item.description: 在过去的几个月里，从伦敦到纽约的商业航班的货舱里不断出现密封的木箱，它们被捆绑得严严实实，以防被篡改。当它们降落在美国本土时，就会被卡车收走，而卡车司机一般都不知道他们运的是什么。【原文：Over the last few months, sealed wooden boxes have been arriving in the holds of commercial flights from London to New York, strapped up and tightly packed against tampering. When they land stateside, they are collected by trucks whose drivers, generally, don’t know what they’re hauling.】

item.title: TikTok 影响者利用八卦的力量挫败移民及海关执法局的搜捕行动
item.description:
视频警告执法突袭，提供避免被驱逐出境的提示。【原文：

Videos warn of law-enforcement raids, provide tips to avoid deportation.

】

item.title: 数据中心高管正寻求融资 5 亿美元押注房车存储
item.description: Gary Wojtaszek 将数据中心公司 CyrusOne 打造成一家巨头公司，然后将其出售给 KKR & Co.现在，他正在为另一种赌注寻求 5 亿美元。【原文：Gary Wojtaszek built data-center company CyrusOne into a powerhouse, then sold it to KKR & Co. and Global Infrastructure Partners in a deal valued at about $15 billion. Now, he’s seeking $500 million for another kind of bet.】

item.title: 日本计划限制芯片和量子计算技术出口
item.description: 日本扩大出口管制，将尖端芯片和量子计算机相关技术纳入管制范围，中方警告此举可能对两国贸易产生负面影响。【原文：Japan expanded its export controls to include cutting-edge chips and quantum computer-related technology, a move China warned could have a negative impact on trade between the two countries.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所 Kraken 称去年收入翻了一番多
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Kraken 一直希望成为一家上市公司，该公司表示，在去年创纪录的数字资产市场涨势中，其收入增长了一倍多。【原文：The crypto exchange Kraken, which has long-held aspirations of becoming a publicly-traded company, said revenue more than doubled during last year’s record-breaking digital asset market rally.】

item.title: 美联储最青睐的通胀指标在 2024 年末以微弱升势收官
item.description: 美联储首选的基本通胀指标在 12 月份依然低迷，这应支持今年进一步降低利率。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s preferred measure of underlying inflation remained muted in December, which should support further reductions in interest rates this year.】

item.title: 美国劳动力成本环比增幅为 2021 年以来最低
item.description: 美国第四季度劳动力成本增长较上年同期有所放缓，这让美联储政策制定者放心，工资压力正在逐步减小，不再是通胀的主要驱动因素。【原文：US labor cost growth cooled in the fourth quarter from a year earlier, reassuring Federal Reserve policymakers wage pressures are gradually diminishing and no longer a key driver of inflation.】

item.title: 雄心勃勃的小公司猎取大猎物，大胆并购浪潮卷土重来
item.description: 交易环境的改善正在鼓励一些小公司开始捕猎大得多的猎物。【原文：The improving environment for deals is encouraging some smaller firms to start hunting much larger prey.】

item.title: 加拿大经济在最后一季度回暖，增长 1.8%
item.description: 在一系列快速降息措施的推动下，加拿大经济在去年年底获得了增长，同时这个北方国家也在为特朗普政府威胁征收 25% 的关税做准备。【原文：The Canadian economy gained strength at the end of last year, fueled by a rapid series of interest-rate cuts, as the northern nation braces for the Trump administration’s threatened 25% tariffs.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼希望在降息前取得更多通胀进展
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）表示，在央行进一步降低利率之前，她希望看到在通胀方面取得更多进展，并质疑在经济强劲的情况下限制性政策的力度。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman said she wants to see additional progress on inflation before the central bank lowers interest rates further, and questioned how restrictive policy might be given the economy’s strength.】

item.title: BCP 部门称法律风险抑制了波兰的固定贷款市场
item.description: 据葡萄牙商业银行（Banco Comercial Portugues SA）在当地的分支机构称，波兰目前的法律框架阻碍了新生的固定利率抵押贷款市场的扩张，使其与西欧模式的差距进一步拉大。【原文：Poland’s current legal framework is hampering the expansion of the nascent market for fixed-rate mortgages, setting it further apart from the western European model, according to Banco Comercial Portugues SA’s local unit.】

item.title: 南非再次停电，结束了 Eskom 连续 10 个月的停电状态
item.description: 南非国有电力公司将自 3 月 26 日以来首次因发电设备故障而开始停电，从而结束了长达 10 个月的停电期。【原文：South Africa’s state-owned power utility will start power cuts for the first time since March 26 due to the breakdown of generation units, ending a 10-month break from the outages that both drew praise for the utility and raised suspicion.】

item.title: 德国通胀保持不变，支持欧洲央行谨慎加息
item.description: 德国通胀率依然高企，提醒欧洲中央银行在继续降息时仍需谨慎。【原文：German inflation remained elevated, reminding the European Central Bank that caution is still needed as it continues to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 亚马逊密西西比数据中心价格飙升 60% 至 160 亿美元
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）在密西西比（Mississippi）的大规模数据中心项目预计将比之前宣布的花费高出 60%，这凸显了人工智能基础设施成本的不断攀升。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is expected to spend 60% more than previously announced on a massive data center project in Mississippi, underscoring the escalating costs for artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 供应担忧挥之不去，咖啡将迎来两个月来最大涨幅
item.description: 纽约阿拉比卡咖啡期货将创下自 11 月底以来的最大月度涨幅，市场关注的焦点是持续的供应短缺信号。【原文：Arabica coffee futures in New York were set for the biggest monthly gain since late November with the market focused on persistent signals of supply shortages.】

item.title: 德国商业银行宣布回购 4 亿欧元股票
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）宣布回购价值高达 4 亿欧元（4.15 亿美元）的股票，作为支付去年利润 71% 的承诺的一部分。【原文：Commerzbank AG announced a share buyback worth as much as €400 million ($415 million) as part of a pledge to pay out 71% of last year’s profit.】

item.title: Blackstone 预计数万亿美元将从富人流向私人市场
item.description: Blackstone Inc.的一位高级常务董事表示，随着富裕个人有更多机会进入这个一度由机构投资者主导的行业，私募市场将迎来数万亿美元的资金流入。【原文：Private markets are set to see trillions of dollars of inflows as wealthy individuals gain greater access to an industry once dominated by institutional investors, according to a senior managing director at Blackstone Inc.】
